about_the_game:
Do you ever have a dream to make a game but lacking appropriate tools?
Do you have a good novel but suffering from poor programming skills?
From now on, all of these scene will not reappear. iFVN will help you to overcome all the difficulties!

Easy Visual Development

  • Create visual novel with multiple resolutions.
  • Like playing with building blocks, it is easy to make background image, portrait and dialog box.
  • The vivid command is a perfect substitute for programming.

New Dialog Box Is More Convenient To Modify

Without changing the script, customize the dialog box by easy settings.

Extensive Library of Triggers, Novices can also make games

  • You can make character dialogue, weather effect with only one trigger!
  • Beginners without programming knowledge can also make cool animation, dazzling particle effect!  
  • For professionals, it offered script editor with JavaScript to expand your game.

Comprehensive MOD, Constantly Updated Resource

Customize user interface, puzzle game template, password lock, opinion interface, inventory & shop and other MODs help you to build a wonderful words world!

Scanning Code To Play Online, Easy To Package Game

  • Scanning code in LAN, then you can play your game on mobile phone.
  • All of the leading platform are supported, including PC, Web, Android, and upcoming iOS!
  • No complex development environment required. Packaging to multi platform by pressing one button.
  • iFVN supports PC ,web and Android packaging now, and other packaging functions will be offered in future!
